content:
Lock-Info Header

    LockInfo = “Lock-Info” “:” DAVLockType SP DAVLockScope


    DAVLockType = “LockType” “=“ DAVLockTypeValue

    DAVLockTypeValue = (“Write”

    | *(uchar | reserved))

    DAVLockScope = “LockScope” “=“ DAVLockScopeValue

    DAVLockScopeValue = (“Exclusive” | “Shared” | *(uchar | reserved))

  • Allows the access type and mode type to be specified, with room for expansion
